pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, January 8, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Canada - Modern Treaty and Self-Governing First Nations Forum, and will deliver opening remarks. Minister of Indigenous Services Jane Philpott, Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Carolyn Bennett, and Minister of Environment and Climate Change Catherine McKenna will also attend.

Victoria Hall, Level 1
John G. Diefenbaker Building
111 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for opening remarks
    • Media should present themselves to the Library Room no later than 2:00 p.m.
